answers.answer: The best to dilate is to walk a lot. Altought i know it is hard at this week. I have read about success induction when cervix is closed they just take longer. They give you first something to soft the cervix so there is still hope. Keep strong your baby will be here soon

question: So I'm 39 weeks on saturday. I have to deliver my 39th week due to diabetes. When I went to the doctor on friday. I have not ripened, the baby isn't engaged yet,  no dialation,  no braxton hicks or contractions. So the doctor said I'm not even inducible.  It wont.wotk becuase my body isn't sent ready. But isn't set I want to try I can.  He would induce me give me 6 hours to see if my body reacts. If it doesn't work then he would do a c section. Or I can just schedule a c section. Since I have a few days to spare he said he would recheck me on Monday and we will decide from there.Has anyone had any progress in 3 days.? I'm hoping something gives by monday so that I can be induced and at least try for a vaginal birth.
title: how long did it take u to dialate.
